attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have EVER downloaded in my life. It is actively trying to bring racists, fascists, and pedophiles closer together all while spreading COVID-19. Keep yourself and your family safe by staying away from this app!!

attributes.title: My trauma
attributes.review: Someone recommended this app to me and my oh my have I been traumatized. I opened the app to see an ORANGE,how ridiculous. I had to get stitches on my eyes and my mammoth had to comfort me. Thanks to this app me AND my mammoth are traumatized.
